{"step_by_step_thinking": "Cephalometric analysis is a diagnostic tool used in orthodontics to evaluate craniofacial relationships. It involves superimposing on stable structures that do not change or grow over time. The Sella-Nasion plane, which is a line drawn from the Sella turcica to the Nasion, is one such stable structure.", "answer_choice": "A. Sella - Nasion plane"}
